title: Justice Override Event
description: A structured record of human intervention in automated decisions. Used to retrain trust models and establish precedents on ChittyChain. Core mechanism of the Antifragile Justice Loop.

override_id.description: Unique identifier for this override event.

original_decision_ref.description: Pointer to the automated decision event that is being contested or corrected.

original_decision_context.description: Captured context of the original automated decision for audit purposes.

overriding_actor.description: Identity and authorization of the human or authorized agent performing the override.

authority_proof.description: Cryptographic signature verifying the actor's right to override.

delegation_chain.description: If authority was delegated, the chain of delegation.

justification.description: Detailed reasoning for the override, used for precedent-setting and model retraining.

category.description: Classification of why the override was necessary.

narrative.description: Mandatory detailed explanation of the reasoning. Must be substantive for precedent value.

cited_precedents.description: Links to prior ChittyChain blocks supporting this decision.

evidence_attachments.description: Supporting documents or data submitted as evidence.

hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the attachment content.

dissenting_opinions.description: If multiple reviewers were involved, capture dissenting views.

outcome_diff.description: Structured comparison of the AI result vs. the human-corrected result.

original_score.description: The score or value produced by the automated system.

final_score.description: The corrected score or value after human override.

original_outcome.description: Description of what the automated decision would have resulted in.

corrected_outcome.description: Description of the outcome after human correction.

parameter_adjustments.description: Technical feedback on which model parameters were incorrect.

affected_entities.description: All entities whose outcomes are changed by this override.

learning_directive.description: Instructions for the ChittyTrust model retraining system.

should_retrain.description: Whether this override should trigger model retraining.

training_weight.description: Relative importance of this training signal (higher = more influential).

apply_retroactively.description: Whether similar past decisions should be reviewed.

scope.description: How broadly this learning should be applied.

ledger_commitment.description: ChittyChain anchoring information after the override is committed.

block_hash.description: Hash of the ChittyChain block containing this precedent.

precedent_uri.description: Permanent URI to reference this precedent in future decisions.
